Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: meroxa

Arguments.Name: --timeout
Arguments.Description: Set the duration of the client timeout in seconds

Arguments.Name: --docker-hub-access-token
Arguments.Description: DockerHub access token to use to build and deploy the app

Arguments.Name: --docker-hub-username
Arguments.Description: DockerHub username to use to build and deploy the app

Arguments.Name: --env
Arguments.Description: Environment (name or UUID) where application will be deployed to

Arguments.Name: --path
Arguments.Description: Path to the app directory (default is local directory)

Arguments.Name: --skip-collection-validation
Arguments.Description: Skips unique destination collection and looping validations

Arguments.Name: --spec
Arguments.Description: Deployment specification version to use to build and deploy the app

Arguments.Name: --path
Arguments.Description: Path to the app directory (default is local directory)

Arguments.Name: --mod-vendor
Arguments.Description: Whether to download modules to vendor or globally while initializing a Go application

Arguments.Name: --path
Arguments.Description: Path where application will be initialized (current directory as default)

Arguments.Name: --skip-mod-init
Arguments.Description: Whether to run 'go mod init' while initializing a Go application

Arguments.Name: log
Arguments.Description: View relevant logs to the state of the given Turbine Data Application

Arguments.Name: --path
Arguments.Description: Path to the app directory (default is local directory)

Arguments.Name: open
Arguments.Description: Open the link to a Turbine Data Application in the Dashboard

Arguments.Description: Path to the app directory (default is local directory)

Arguments.Description: Path to the app directory (default is local directory)

Arguments.Description: Path where application exists (current directory as default)

Arguments.Description: Login or Sign up to the Meroxa Platform
